TopicTitle: SLS's somewhat handy list of Alcubierre Drive/Hypothetical/Advanced Propulsion mods

Articles.Content:
For whatever reason, I felt the need to compile a list of these mods for reference. *And what better place to do it than on the Forum?*

ALCUBIERRE DRIVE MODS

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[**USI Warp Drive**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100798-0-90-Alcubierre-Warp-Drive-%28Stand-alone%29-v0-1-0-2014-12-16) **(0.90)**

*My absolute favorite Alcubierre Drive mod. This Alcubierre Drive mod simulates in KSP how a real-world Alcubierre Drive would work by translating the ship's position. It is completely standalone and only requires the included Regolith mod to help convert ElectricCharge to ExoticMater.*

[**KSP Interstellar**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43839-0-25-KSP-Interstellar-%28Magnetic-Nozzles-ISRU-Revamp%29-Version-0-13) **(0.25)**

*KSP Interstellar is a plugin for Kerbal Space Program, designed to encourage bootstrapping toward ever more advanced levels of technology as well as utilising In-Situ resources to expand the reach of Kerbal civilization.*

NOTE: As Fractal\_UK is on (hopefully temporary) hiatus, Boris-Barboris has released an updated configuration [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104943-0-90-KSP-Interstellar-port-maintance-thread).

[**NASA IXS CLASS WARPSHIP, AND SPACEDOCKS**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92816-NASA-IXS-Class-Warpship-and-Spacedocks-For-KSP-I-and-Stock-KSP) **(0.24.2)**

*Introducing the IXS Class Warpship concept from NASA scientist Dr. Harold White. This mod is for KSP-I lite. BETA TESTERS - please make sure to dock your current vessels and bring your kerbals home safely before upgrading, this 1.0 -will- break your beta versions, but you'll hopefully feel it is worth it when you see the improvements!*

NOTE: While this mod is no longer being maintained, \_Agustus\_ has released an 0.90 maintenance version for RoverDude's USI Warp Drive [HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111227-NASA-IXS-Class-Warpship-and-Spacedocks-for-RoverDude-s-Stand-Alone-Alcubierre-Drive-Version-1-1).

HYPOTHETICAL PROPULSION MODS

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[**ORION AKA "OL' BOOM-BOOM"**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28428-Orion-aka-Ol-Boom-boom) **(0.25/0.90)**

*Quite possibly the most "kerbal" propulsion system out there. Mod is a WIP and does NOT work with 0.90 unless the correct .dll files are installed (download on the thread)*

[**LCARS IMPULSE DRIVE**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86169-0-90-LCARS-Mark-II-Dev-and-Support-Beta-Release-%2816-Dez-2014%29) **(0.90)**

*Ideal for combination with*[*StarVisions's SiFi Shipyard*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37908-0-90-SciFi-Shipyards-v2-3)*, this mod adds an ultra-advanced (and ultra-cool) sub-Lightspeed impulse drive.*

[**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Netherdyne Mass Accelerator/Mass Driver**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103511-Pre-Release-0-90-FIXED-Netherdyne-Mass-Driver-Mod) **(0.90)**

*These parts originally come from the Stanford Torus Mod,* [*which reached version 0.50 on Curse*](http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/221761-stanford-torus-0-5) *on October 17th, 2014 before apparently having its development dis-continued (the release on the KSP Forums is even older, and only goes up to version 0.30). It was definitely worth re-releasing the mass driver parts.*

[**Parameciumkid's Para-Sci Jump Drive**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66921-Part-Plugin-parameciumkid-s-Jump-Drive-v0-5-%28new-models-and-sound-effects!%29) **(0.90)**

*This mod adds a Jump Drive, which is pretty much a* *teleporter. It requires a lot of ElectricCharge, so it is justifiable. I recommend using it with reactors or solar panels from NearFutureTechnologies.*

[**ESLD Jump Beacons**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91582) **(0.24.2/**[**0.90 fix**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91582-24-2-ESLD-Jump-Beacons-Dev-0-3b-2014-09-21?p=1688535&viewfull=1#post1688535)**)**

*Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Like the other Jump Drive mod, this addon introduces supposedly non-OP teleportation devices for traveling to other planets FAST.*

[**Joolian Discovery**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95383) **(0.90)**

*Adds the famous "Discovery One" spacecraft from the 1968 film 2001: A Space Odyssey. Part of the NecroBones suite of mods that includes such titles as* [*Modular Rocket Systems (MRS)*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93067)*,* [*Fuel Tanks Plus*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108238)*,* [*Color Coded Canisters*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104660)*, and my personal favorite,* [*Burger Mod*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94648)*.*

Advanced Propulsion Mods

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[**Near Future Propulsion**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-0-90-0-25-Near-Future-Technologies-%28NFPropulsion-0-90%29) **(0.25/0.90)**

This mod is jam-packed with ion thrusters, VASMIR engines, and more! Good luck with stacking enough RTGs and Solar Panels to run them at full power, though; I recommend NearFuture Electrical (same page, just scroll down).

**Want a mod added to the list? Just reply with the mod's name and a link to the Forum thread or CurseForge page.**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T03:07:56Z" title="04/29/2015 03:07  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by SpaceLaunchSystem**

Add this one: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66921-Part-Plugin-parameciumkid-s-Jump-Drive-v0-5-%28new-models-and-sound-effects!%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66921-Part-Plugin-parameciumkid-s-Jump-Drive-v0-5-%28new-models-and-sound-effects!%29)

One of the best warp mods imo. And its not actually that cheaty.

Also: [ESLD Jump Beacons](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91582). It's for 0.24, but there's a [0.90 fix here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91582-24-2-ESLD-Jump-Beacons-Dev-0-3b-2014-09-21?p=1688535&viewfull=1#post1688535)

Done!

Feel free to post some more advanced propulsion mods, weather they're OP or not.
I might be working on a wormhole mod soon, so be ready to add it once I'm done ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
